resources.string: Switch on this mode and play any song on your smart phone to sync it with your LaalTen
Place your phone near another speaker to sync with external music
Turn this mode on to rapidly stobe light giving you a trippy experience
Colors will automatically blend slowly giving you a soothing feel
Use your LaalTen as a normal lamp with ambient light.
Set the mood of your room to intense with dim red color.
We are a bunch of unemployed engineers trying to build fun,cheap products and earn us some money in the process.
Feel the trippy lights strobing at mindblowing speeds
Play any song on your smart phone and sync with lights
Sync your lights with sound from mic
Use this light for an ambient mood
Change the mood to intense with this dark mode.
Let the light calm you down with this soothing mode
